author: Lindsey Stirling
description:
This holiday season, we have some special VIP packages for you. From front row seats and meet & greets to my magical Gingerbread House Party with Q&A, games, cocoa, cookies, and a gallery of costumes, there’s a perfect experience for everyone. Each package includes limited-edition holiday merch, early entry, and a signed keepsake.

🌟We have a NEW package this year! There is a Post-Show Meet & Greet Experience where you will get premium seating plus a special meet & greet with me, a personalized holiday video greeting for you and your loved one, plus exclusive gifts.

Tickets here: https://www.lindseystirling.com/tour
title: Artist presale & VIP are both live now! Snag your tickets early! ❤️
